column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Unfortunately I would have to say the pizza was pretty good
column2: but not mind blowing. We ordered the Chicago Classic Pizza. The ingredients tasted fresh
column3: but were a bit bland and watered up pretty quickly in the middle of the pizza
column4: causing the crust to become soggy. The butter crust was okkk..kind of a dry
column5: bland corn meal type crust. The cheese did not appear to be of high quality. It was more on par with mozarella from Round Table or Pizza Hut.
